root.message: The SOURCE_TYPE field for indicator 2-5-2, translated into en
root.data: DAD-IS is the Domestic Animal Diversity Information System maintained and developed by FAO (http://www.fao.org/dad-is/en/). It provides access to searchable databases of breed-related information and photos and links to other online resources on livestock diversity. It allows to analyze the diversity of livestock breeds on national, regional and global levels including the status of breeds regarding their risk of extinction. DAD-IS currently contains data from 182 countries and 38 species. It contains information on more than 8,800 mammalian and avian breeds, among those about 7,700 are considered local (i.e. reported to occur in only one country).
